home.text_base_description: Welcome to 348 Dolores Street located in the heart of San Francisco's vibrant & popular Mission Dolores. From the gorgeous facade & beautiful outlooks to the well laid out & spacious(over 1,500 sq ft) floorpan, this top floor, classic TIC flat will certainly check all your boxes! 3 spacious BRs, home office(or 4th BR), LR, eat-in kitchen, in-unit washer/dryer, delightful, lush outdoor garden/entertaining space & parking provide an ideal place to live, work, & entertain in the heart of the city. Exclusive roof rights will have you dreaming of your own private view roof deck. Architectural features include curved windows, hardwood floors, period detailing & high ceilings. With a Walkscore of 95 and just steps away from hip bars, artesian coffee shops, trendy restaurants, Whole Foods, J-Church, MUNI, 16th BART station, Dolores Park, & Valencia Corridor, the best of our beautiful city is at your doorstep. A Chic Urban Oasis, 348 Dolores is a must see & the perfect place to call home

home_facts.Property_Type: Flat, Top Floor, Tenancy In Common
